title: RNG
data:
[[Dungeon Crawl]] uses a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Random_number_generation random number generator] ('''RNG''') to determine the outcome of in-game events.

==Anthropomorphism==

The RNG is sometimes referred to as the '''Random Number God'''. The RNG plays a pivotal role in determining the fate of all characters, and is sometimes considered the deadliest enemy in the game, despite the fact that experienced players will rarely die, unless they made a mistake.

One of [[Xom]]'s alternate titles is the "Random Number God". Xom is the god of true chaos, and his title changes every time you access the religion screen.
